Name: castsource
Description: oid of the source data type

Name: casttarget
Description: oid of the target data type

Name: castfunc
Description: the oid of the function to use to perform this cast. zero is stored if the data types are binary coercible (that is, no run-time operation is needed to perform the cast).

Name: castcontext
Description: indicates what contexts the cast may be invoked in. e means only as an explicit cast (using cast, ::, or function-call syntax). a means implicitly in assignment to a target column, as well as explicitly. i means implicitly in expressions, as well as the other cases.
